item.title: My Experience of being a Teaching Assistant in School of Computing :thinking:
item.author: Zhu Yufan
item.description: Last week, I finished conducting my last tutorial session and makring last set of homework as A Teaching Assitant in School of Computing. I want to write this post to share my experienceof being a Teaching Assitant and how did I got an offer from SOC.

item.title: Unexpected Use of Zobrist Hashing :eyes:
item.author: Zhu Yufan
item.description: This post is kind of a following up to the previous post. I found a surprising question where Zobrist hashing is applicable. Alert: this post is going to be a bit technical!

item.title: The power of Iterative Deepening Minimax search with Alpha Beta Pruning :boom:
item.author: Zhu Yufan
item.description: I did a mini project when taking CS2109s (Introduction to AI and ML), where I built an AI agent for a simple board game, Breakthrough, with iterative deepening minimax search algorithm. What it can achieve blew my mind!

item.title: My Experience of Matriculation to NUS Computer Science :sunglasses:
item.author: Zhu Yufan
item.description: Check out this post to find out how did I get accept by NUS CS and receive the S&T Merit Scholarship. This post may be expecially applicable for international students study in Singapore.

item.title: Modules that I have taken for each semester in NUS :eyes:
item.author: Zhu Yufan
item.description: This is not a very formal post, just keeping track of all the modules that I have taken across the years.
